ch0017_00_leaf/0101_0701_01_10:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! You made it!
How’s your partner Pokémon doing?
ch0017_00_leaf/0101_0701_02_10:
Make sure you take good care of it, all right?
Don’t push it more than necessary.
ch0017_00_leaf/0601_0701_01_10:
I’ll protect my Pokémon no matter what.
That’s my golden rule.
ch0017_00_leaf/0601_0701_02_10:
Why? Because he chose me. Out of everybody
else, he chose me to be his Trainer.
ch0017_00_leaf/0601_0701_03_10:
That alone makes me want to protect him
from anything!
ch0017_00_leaf/0601_0702_01_10:
Seeing somebody important to me get hurt
is so much worse than getting hurt myself!
ch0017_00_leaf/0601_0702_02_10: I think you understand that feeling well.
ch0017_00_leaf/0602_0701_01_10:
You see a lot of Trainers keep their Pokémon
out of their Poké Balls on Pasio, right?
ch0017_00_leaf/0602_0701_02_10:
I’m glad to be able to walk around with
my Eevee, but it does worry me a bit...
ch0017_00_leaf/0602_0701_03_10:
He’s just too cute!
Somebody might want to kidnap him!
ch0017_00_leaf/0602_0702_01_10:
Or maybe a talent agent might want to make
him a Pokémon model! Would that mean we
couldn’t be together anymore?!
ch0017_00_leaf/0602_0702_02_10:
Oh no! Wh-where’d I put his Poké Ball?!
I have to protect him!
ch0017_00_leaf/0603_0701_01_10:
There are a lot of great things about Pasio,
but I think some of the most impressive things
are the different smells.
ch0017_00_leaf/0603_0701_02_10:
The scent of flowers wafts from the forest,
carried by the wind.
ch0017_00_leaf/0603_0701_03_10:
Sometimes I stop to get lost in the aroma of
the flowers.
ch0017_00_leaf/0603_0701_04_10:
And then I realize that everybody’s staring at me
like I’m a weirdo.
ch0017_00_leaf/0603_0702_01_10:
You can smell delicious smells coming from
the city, and you can smell the salt from the
ocean breeze.
ch0017_00_leaf/0603_0702_02_10: Man, I just can’t get enough of Pasio!
ch0017_00_leaf/0604_0701_01_10:
There are a lot of Rattata around Pallet Town in
Kanto. That’s where I’m from.
ch0017_00_leaf/0604_0701_02_10: This one time long ago, one snuck into our kitchen!
ch0017_00_leaf/0604_0701_03_10:
It nibbled on so much of our food...
I couldn’t believe what was happening when I
walked through the door!
ch0017_00_leaf/0604_0701_04_10:
While it did surprise me, that Rattata looked so
happy eating, I couldn’t get angry at it!
ch0017_00_leaf/0604_0702_01_10:
I travel around with my Pokémon and spend all my
time with them, but I always find new surprises!
ch0017_00_leaf/0604_0702_02_10:
It makes me want to know about Pokémon
even more!
ch0017_00_leaf/0604_0702_03_10: Maybe that’s just the nature of being a Trainer?
ch0017_00_leaf/0605_0701_01_10: Hey! I think I just figured something out!
ch0017_00_leaf/0605_0701_02_10: You know how my Eevee is super cute?
ch0017_00_leaf/0605_0701_03_10:
Not only that—he’s so strong! Like, nobody
can even touch him!
ch0017_00_leaf/0605_0701_04_10: Is it possible...that we’re the strongest?
ch0017_00_leaf/0605_0702_01_10:
Maybe you can be my rival,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0017_00_leaf/0605_0702_02_10:
You take good care of your partner Pokémon,
and you’ve got some real talent when it comes
to battling.
ch0017_00_leaf/1701_0701_02_10:
I wanted to give this to you!
I’m sure it’ll come in handy!
ch0017_00_leaf/1701_0702_01_10: Well, I’m off! Take care of yourself!
ch0017_00_leaf/2501_0701_01_10:
Eevee’s front paws are soooooo fluffy and soft!
It feels great to just squeeze them!
ch0017_00_leaf/2501_0701_02_10:
They’re so small and cute, but they have so much
power behind them, too.
ch0017_00_leaf/2501_0701_03_10:
He’s always so reliable, but at the same time,
I can’t help but feel really protective of him!
ch0017_00_leaf/2501_0702_01_10:
Pokémon have a very mysterious charm
about them.
ch0017_00_leaf/2501_0702_02_10: Aah, I love him sooo much... I just can’t even—
ch0017_00_leaf/2511_0701_01_10:
Right now, I’m really into making different
flower crowns for my Eevee.
ch0017_00_leaf/2511_0701_02_10:
I pick flowers that might look good on him, and
when I put them on his head, sometimes he cries
out happily and other times he doesn’t react at all.
ch0017_00_leaf/2511_0701_03_10:
That means he has preferences, too, right?
I should take notes next time!
ch0017_00_leaf/2511_0702_01_10:
What kinds of flowers do you think Eevee would
like best?
ch0017_00_leaf/2511_0702_02_10:
Maybe I should have him choose for me when
I make my next flower crown.
ch0017_00_leaf/2511_0702_03_10: Heh heh! I’m already getting excited!
ch0017_00_leaf/3001_0701_01_10:
Sometimes I wish Trainers could use
photosynthesis, too. I would just spread out my
arms and soak up the sun.
ch0017_00_leaf/3002_0701_01_10:
Nothing like early morning sunshine to wake me
up and fill me with energy for the day!
ch0017_00_leaf/3003_0701_01_10:
You know, I’m glad I came to Pasio. There’re so
many different Trainers and Pokémon to meet!
ch0017_00_leaf/3004_0701_01_10:
Everywhere you look, the scenery here on Pasio
is so gorgeous! It would be a waste to stay
cooped up inside all day!
ch0017_00_leaf/3005_0701_01_10:
Everything seems a little bit different at night,
don’t you think? Pasio, Pokémon...even people!
ch0017_00_leaf/3006_0701_01_10:
You’d think I would hate the dark, but actually I
don’t! There are lots of Pokémon that can only be
found at night!
